name: Timeline Traveler
description:
Description:


Timeline Traveler is a puzzle game that combined time control and platformer element together to provide a new game experience. In the game, you need to control the timelines and change the moving timing of objects in the scene to help the hero reach the goal!

Gameplay:

Observe the Scene


The objects on the scene will act according to the timelines. You may observe how is the movement of those object.

Manage the Timelines


By moving the timelines, the moving timing of the objects will also change.

Reach the Goal


Try to help the Clock Monster to reach the goal and finish the level!
